name: A Vampire´s Love Letter
description:
A cute small Lofi game for Spooktober! Being a witch, you try to help your friend with her relationship. Gather ingredients,  brew and create potions! 

Controls:

-WASD Movement

-Mouse Click: Select/deselect objects

-R: skip message

-Ctr: crouch

Credits

Music by: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/lofi-hip-hop-musi...
